analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ rūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na rūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe
